name: It's Buzziness Time
description: It's time to get Buzzy! Work your way from newbie intern to a big boss in this fast-paced workplace strategy game.  With dozens of unique tasks and only so much time in the workday, see how well you can get all of your assigned tasks done and earn a promotion. This quick run-around will show you what being 'Busy as a Bee' is really all about.
